Simply amazing movie... Eerie, cold and haunting with a perfect matching score with out-of-tune violin and ambient sounds.. One of my top three movies!

Seven episodes, each taking place on a different day of the week, on the theme of suicide and violent death.
The body of a naked man floats in blackness. Slowly stretching out from a foetal position it begins to decompose. A little girl sits in the sun scribbling in a sketchbook. \&#039;Der Todesking\&#039; - deathking - she writes.
Der Todesking, JÃƒÆ’?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¶rg Buttgereit\&#039;s second full-length feature film, has no central character or characters, but instead thematic continuity in the act of suicide. Divided into days of the week, it comprises of a series of set-pieces, each featuring the self-destruction of a complete stranger.

Rippedfrom the limited Special European edition with lots of sweet extras.
Movie untouched but extras slightly shrinked. Encoded with DVD-shrink
